Package it.polimi.ingsw.events.clienttoserver

Class SelectedProductionToServer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.events.clienttoserver.EventToServer
it.polimi.ingsw.events.clienttoserver.SelectedProductionToServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class SelectedProductionToServer
extends EventToServer
This class represents the event of the selection of the power production turn to send to the server .
Author:
Stefano Fossati.
See Also:
Serialized Form

    Constructs the event.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void acceptServerVisitor​(EventToServerVisitor visitor)
    This method allows the class that implements EventToServerVisitor in the server side to read and recognise this class as event send from the client.
    java.util.ArrayList<Resource> getMaterialLeaders()
    Getter of the materials choose by the player to use for the additional production power of the leader cards.
    java.lang.String getPlayerName()
    Getter of the name of the player that sends the event.
    ProductedMaterials getResourceGranted()
    Getter of the resource that the player wants to generate from the base production power.
    Resource getResourceRequested1()
    Getter of the first material choose by the player to use for the base production power.
    Resource getResourceRequested2()
    Getter of the second material choose by the player to use for the base production power.
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> getUseDevelop()
    Getter of the development card that the player decides to activate.
    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> getUseLeaders()
    Getter of the ArrayList of boolean that indicates if the player wants to activate the leader card additional production.
    boolean isUseBaseProduction()
    Getter of the boolean that indicates if the player choose to activate the base production power or not.

  • Constructor Details

    • SelectedProductionToServer

      public SelectedProductionToServer​(boolean useBaseProduction, Resource resourceRequested1, Resource resourceRequested2, ProductedMaterials resourceGranted, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> useLeaders, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> materialLeaders, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> useDevelop, java.lang.String playerName)
      Constructs the event.
      Parameters:
      useBaseProduction - Is true if the player selected the base production power, else is false.
      resourceRequested1 - The first material choose by the player to use for the base production power.
      resourceRequested2 - The second material choose by the player to use for the base production power.
      resourceGranted - The resource that the player wants to generate from the base production power.
      useLeaders - the position of the leader card is true if the player wants to use a leader card additional production, else false. All the leader card that are not additional production are set on false in this ArrayList.
      materialLeaders - The materials choose by the player to use for the additional production power of the leader cards.
      useDevelop - The development card that the player decides to activate.
      playerName - The name of the player that sends the event.

    • getUseLeaders

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> getUseLeaders()
      Getter of the ArrayList of boolean that indicates if the player wants to activate the leader card additional production. All other type of leader card are set of false.
      Returns:
      The resource that the player wants to generate from the base production power.
